title: Fueled by Falsehoods, a Michigan Group Is Ready to Challenge the Vote
description: In private meetings, activists, lawyers and G.O.P. officials laid out their strategy. “If there is a close election, it’s going to be up to us to fix it,” one said.
media:credit: Nic Antaya for The New York Times
media:description: Poll workers sorted absentee ballots for processing while being monitored by poll watchers and challengers on Sunday at Huntington Place in Detroit.
